about_the_game:
Hero's Delirium is a co-op medieval fantasy RPG that will take you and three other people on an exciting adventure. Explore the semi-open world and kill enemies and monsters that roam it.

Features
  • Singleplayer / Multiplayer
  • An open-world campaign
  • .Collect weapons, armor, and spells.

Gameplay

Collect weapons and armor and level up to get stronger and combat more powerful adversaries. Complete quests to get rewards that will help you in your adventure. The game can be performed both offline and online.

The Story

This adventure will challenge you to defend the world from an evil mind-controlling ruler. You and numerous heroes will work together to clear dungeons and free the people.

Play online

Connect with three other people to play.

content_descriptors.notes:
The player will Attack and be attacked by hostile enemies. No blood or gore is present in the video game. They are ragdoll effects after a player or enemy has died. One Enemy is a skeleton.
There is the use of alcohol in the game, which can be consumed to give the player a positive ability. 
Sexual content is limited to having the player go through an optional quest line involving a brathal. The player will not be involved in any sexual acts nor will any sexual act be displayed. 
Also, there is one weapon that has a reference to genitalia
